short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very clean New Tab page addon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very clean New Tab page with just a simple clock and a background image. Settings for customizing the background image & seconds display and for an optional current weather display.
